Table of Contents
  • What is the 1st rule of web development?:drill:
    • Notes:explain:
  • What does HTTP GET do?:drill:
    • Notes:explain:
  • What are HTTP header fields?:drill:
    • Notes:explain:
  • How does the server and web browser communicate with each other?:drill:
    • Notes:explain:
  • Related
  • References
  • External Links

What is the 1st rule of web development?

The 1st rule of web development is to [always keep the developer console open on your browser, by pressing F12.]

Notes

Make sure that the Network tab is open, and check the Disable cache option

What does HTTP GET do?

[Requests a representation of a specified resource, Requests using GET should only retrieve data]

Notes

What are HTTP header fields?

HTTP header fields [are components of the header section of request and response messages in HTTP]

Notes

The HTTP headers define the operating parameters of an HTTP transaction

How does the server and web browser communicate with each other?

The server and web browser communicate with each othe rusing the [HTTP protocol]

Notes

The network tab shows how the browser and the server communicate.

Related

References

External Links
